price: 6. Nous questionnerons certainement ceux vers qui des Messagers furent envoyés et Nous questionnerons aussi les Envoyés.
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falanasalanna alladhīna ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salīna
